text:
@realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo State of emergency in the USA:
Currently lack of
- humanity
- role model of a president
- pepper spray
- rubber bullets
- Covid-19 tests
- Covid-19 vaccines
- freedom of the press
- social distance
- jobs
- money
- truth
Where has America gone?
